divs: sighting details2 fridays in a row,in 1974, my boyfriend,girlfriend and her boyfriend were crusing down our dirt roads in armada, mi. when,in a corn field we see a disc, dome type thing hovering over a corn field with lights surrounding the bottom of the circular shape thing. we were about 1\4mi from the corn field. the next friday, we decidied to go back to see if we were seeing things. this time, we got out of the car and stood at the edge of the corn field. this is hard write but irealyy don't remember seeing orfeeling my friends around me, but i knew they were there, because i could hear my girlfriend wimpering!!!!! we hung out together for at least an hour, and all of a sudden, this big dome shaped thing slowly came down from the sky.it seemed to be about 6ft. from the corn,and the lights went from fast to slow to faster to really slow and scared the crap out of us, but we couldn't move. i had no perifial vision or the ability to move. then the next thing i remember is my boyfriend grabbing my hand and running and so was my friends. we got in the car and took off like bats out of hell!! i remember nothing for at least 2 days after that. i don't know how any of us got home or what we did the next day. to describe what i saw......it was about the size of a baseball diamond. and about 25-30 ft. tall. the lights seemed to be only 5 or 6 ft from the bottom of the thing. the lights reminded me of xmas lights but very large about a foot in circumference but no real shape. and white!! and to top it off.....my girlfriends, boyfriends brother and his buddies saw the samw thing at a different time, same location. nobody believed any of us!!!! we know what we saw, we even tried to take my friends parents and they laughed. the only reason why i'm telling my story now, is because i just 3 yrs ago started to remember eveything, and my boyfriend back then, is now talking about it in detail. which he never did for 30 some yrs. the more i talk about it, the more i remember.
